review: Works pretty well but is limited by slow internet speeds and does not offer a custom buffering setting, which would be nice. I could stand pre-loading 20 minutes of a movie and letting that absorb the load lag. This is where a larger device is a good idea.Also the product description is too vague with regards to Miracast - while it does support my Moto-X, it does not support Surface Pro tablets or Galaxy tablets. I fully expected the Surface tablets to be be functional on this device since Miracast is their deal. A verified compatibility chart should be provided by Amazon in the product description to make this clear. At least the comparison chart has now been updated to read "Windows 8 support coming soon", but that's a bit of a cop-out. Heck, we'll all be on Windows 10 by the time they get their act together!
author: G. Lavigne

review: The product is exactly what I wanted and works great. It loses a star because of the design of the remote - EXTREMELY difficult to open the back cover to change batteries. It actually has a 3 prong design, which means you have to press VERY hard on the top and sides of the cover while pushing back. I don't have that many thumbs, do you?
author: charkerr "Charlene Kerr"
